org.crosswire.common.xml
类 XMLFeature

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.common.xml.XMLFeature
所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<XMLFeature>
public class XMLFeature
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<XMLFeature>

Wraps an XML Feature. The "known" set of XML Features is found in XMLFeatureSet.

作者：
DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors., 序列化表格
